column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Hostess was a B*tch.  Everyone else was REALLY nice and attentive (Host taking seat numbers
column4: even other hostess).  We see other guest waiting for their table
column5: ordering ahead of time since all deep dish pizzas take awhile.  We went up and order and the host was very direct.  Thinking that we should place the whole order
